name: ˙uʍop ǝpısdn ɯ,ı 'ǝɯ dןǝɥ
description:
˙uʍop ǝpısdn ɯ,ı 'ǝɯ dןǝɥ is a 2D platformer where gravity falls up. Make your way to the safety of solid ground as you navigate through this casadastraphobic nightmare.

This side project was put together in Construct 3, and was a chance for me -- a programmer -- to apply myself in some other disciplines of game development. I got to play around with drawing some pixel art, and dipped my toe into ambient sound design. 

So while this may not be my best or most polished project, at the very least it should help me make my temporary programmer art look a bit nicer in the future.

CONTROLS:

-------------------------

Left & Right Arrows: Move

Up Arrow: Jump, Double Jump
